    123 		case err = <-errc:
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    124 			close(stop)
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    125 			break Repos
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    126 		}
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    127 	}
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    128
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    129 	close(repoc)
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    130 	wg.Wait()
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    131 	select {
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    132 	case err = <-errc:
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    133 	default:
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    134 	}
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    135
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    136 	return err
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    137 }

    139 func checkoutWorker(c <-chan *config.RepoSpec,
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    140 	stop <-chan struct{}, errc chan error) {
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    141 	for {
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    142 		select {
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    143 		case r, ok := <-c:
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    144 			if !ok {
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    145 				return
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    146 			}
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    147 			err := checkoutOne(r)
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    148 			if err != nil {
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    149 				errc <- err
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    150 			}
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    151 		case <-stop:
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    152 			return
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    153 		}
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    154 	}
ad4b81cc12a3d90fd3f37ea0aaa09797b5031136[Tue 23 May 2017 23:52:45 +0000][Josiah Boning <josiah@dropbox.com>]
    155 }
